member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Autofac.Base.Extensions.RegisterKeyedType``2(Autofac.ContainerBuilder)
member.summary: Register a component to be created through reflection, and provide a key that can be used to retrieve the component.
member.remarks: This method leverages Autofac's autowiring of components through reflection, providing a key that directly reflects that component type, so that it might be retrieved by that key and possibly replaced in an adapter chain.
member.typeparam: The type of the component implementation.
The service type provided by the component.
member.returns: Registration builder allowing the registration to be configured.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Autofac.Base.Extensions.RegisterAdapterChain``1(Autofac.ContainerBuilder,System.Type[])
member.summary: Register an adapter chain of components, exposing a shared service interface.
member.remarks: This registers a factory method to create a adapter chain of components, based on wrapping each inner component with an adapter outer component.
member.typeparam: The service type provided by the component.
member.param: The services type keys that can be used to retrieve the components in the chain.
member.returns: Registration builder allowing the registration to be configured.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Conversation
member.summary: The top level composition root for the SDK.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Conversation.SendAsync(Microsoft.Bot.Connector.IMessageActivity,System.Func{Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.IDialog{System.Object}},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Process an incoming message within the conversation.
member.remarks:
This method: 1. Instantiates and composes the required components. 2. Deserializes the dialog state (the dialog stack and each dialog's state) from the . 3. Resumes the conversation processes where the dialog suspended to wait for a . 4. Queues s to be sent to the user. 5. Serializes the updated dialog state in the messages to be sent to the user.
The factory method is invoked for new conversations only, because existing conversations have the dialog stack and state serialized in the data.
member.param: The message sent to the bot.
The factory method to make the root dialog.
member.returns: A task that represents the message to send inline back to the user.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Conversation.ResumeAsync(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.ResumptionCookie,Microsoft.Bot.Connector.IActivity,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Resume a conversation and post the data to the dialog waiting.
member.returns: A task that represent the message to send back to the user after resumption of the conversation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Internals.Fibers.FiberModule.DoNotSerialize(Autofac.IComponentContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Autofac.Core.Parameter})
member.summary: Eagerly enumerate the services keyed with that will not be serialized.
member.remarks: Services marked with will not serialize their dependencies either.
